name: Dark Mode

issues.info: Create a new issue describing your problem in details

description: Changes hard-coded colors to a dark-mode-style theme with an option of customization. Inspired by Absolute's DarkMode Patcher for 2.1.

floating-settings-button.name: Floating settings button
floating-settings-button.description:
Set this to checked to display the button that pulls up these options from any screen, for quick color editing.

<cb>NOTE</c>: you will have to reopen or somehow refresh whatever thing's colors you're editing.

normal-mode-bar.name: Normal mode bar
normal-mode-bar.description: Color for a normal mode bar

practice-mode-bar.name: Practice mode bar
practice-mode-bar.description: Color for a practice mode bar

icon-set-bg.name: Icon set background
icon-set-bg.description: Background of icon set on profile page

even-list-item-bg.name: Even list item background
even-list-item-bg.description: Background of even-numbered items in lists

even-list-item-thin-bg.name: Even thin lists item background
even-list-item-thin-bg.description: Background of even-numbered items in lists (thin mode)

odd-list-item-bg.name: Odd lists item background
odd-list-item-bg.description: Background of odd-numbered items in lists

odd-list-item-thin-bg.name: Odd thin lists item background
odd-list-item-thin-bg.description: Background of odd-numbered items in lists (thin mode)

level-search-bar-bg.name: Level search bar background
level-search-bar-bg.description: Background of level search bar input
